metadata.title: CVE-2024-41073 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:nvme: avoid double free special payloadIf a discard request needs to be retried, and that retry may fail beforea new special payload is added, a double free will result. Clear theRQF_SPECIAL_LOAD when the request is cleaned.

criterions.comment: linux-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws-fips: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
